Subject: Delay in Sales Report
Paragraphs:
Hi Alice,

I am sorry to inform you that I won't be able to provide the latest copy of the sales report by end of the day. The data from the system is taking longer than expected to compile and analyze. I should have it ready by tomorrow morning.

Please let me know if this is a problem or if there is anything else I can do to help.

Sincerely,
Bob
